website_summaries.verdict: With 20 grams of organic protein, this is a filling, healthy meal replacement shake loaded with vitamins and minerals from superfoods.
pros: 6 grams of fiber for a full feeling
Vegan and non-GMO verified, with no gluten, soy, or dairy
cons: Some users dislike the strong taste of the product, and it can tend to separate after sitting

customer_reviews.title: Arsenic, Mercury, Cadmium, Lead, Toxins!!! HOW IS THIS CLEAN?!?! So Furious!
customer_reviews.text: I've consuming this supplement almost on a daily basis... my household also purchases many other items from this company. When we look for things that are labeled 'organic' and 'clean', we would never have thought and imagined that it would score so poorly from the Clean Label Project (google it). Arsenic/Mercury 1 of 5 stars Cadmium/Lead 2 of 5 stars Mycotoxins/Melamine/Antibiotics/BPA/BPS 2 of 5 stars Please reach out to the company and let them know that this is not okay! I'm hoping that enough people stop purchasing this product and telling the company the reason ... so that they would fix this issue. Won't be buying this product anymore unless they make changes.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE after formula change!  Gross.
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the company and was told that they "reformulated" the chocolate. It is disgusting, even from a shaker bottle where you don't have to smell it. I have been drinking this 3 times a week for about *3 years*... I LOVED IT-- 5 starts..... UNTIL this current reformulation... now, I am in search for a new drink. (Orgain organic powder is my new fave!!!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Erin Wiseman-Parkin

customer_reviews.title: Sell out
customer_reviews.text: Why did they sell out to Nestle? This is basically crap now. I need suggestions for a better comparable protein/meal replacement powder. It will ALL ABOUT THE MONEY after all! When companies SELL OUT they no longer SELL OUT. Hope this is a lessened learned! No one's going to buy this Nestle-fixed JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Found a rubber gasket in the mix...YUCK!
customer_reviews.text: If I had reviewed this item a week ago, it'd be 5 stars. I've been using it for maybe 6 months and tried both the vanilla and chocolate, which I think are both tasty. It's one of the healthier ones one the market for a reasonable price. I added 2 scoops of collagen powder and I stayed full until my next meal. Why the 1 star, then? Well my last chocolate shake had some type of rubber gasket in it that survived my blender. I can think of no other place a black gasket could hide than in chocolate shake powder. It was incredibly disgusting and made me instantly nauseous. I returned my unopened bottle and won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Formula Changed Significantly - Not filling AT ALL now, & big reduction in value.
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this, but they've made significant changes/reductions to its formulation. It tastes fine, but (1) they reduced the fiber in it, so it's not nearly as filling, and also reduced its good fats (not acceptable for a "meal" replacement). I find myself wanting two shakes now -- whereas before, I could split one scoop into two shakes (and this totally explains WHY they changed it) which amounts to a big reduction in cost/value for us. Will try to post label comparison pictures soon, and you can decide for yourself. If all I wanted from my "meal replacement" was a whole food vitamin, I'd take a multi.
customer_reviews.author: elledb

customer_reviews.title: Price Gouging
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this many times and I love it! BUT!! The last time I purchased this powder was on March 8th 2020 for $20.47. Now during the COVID-19 pandemic they have doubled the price to $40.94. Looks like Price gouging to me. I will be purchasing competitors products form now on
customer_reviews.author: Bruce O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Wahoo!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. The way I see it, there are heavy metals in everything...if you go by how it makes you feel, you're probably good. These keep me full and stabilize blood sugars. The taste grows on you. I snack less and have lots of energy on the days I drink these. If you add powdered peanut butter and extra fiber...your guts will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney R

customer_reviews.title: Yuuuuummmmm!
customer_reviews.text: I drink this every morning. I’m not even vegan, but the energy this shake gives me is amazing! I drink first thing and I am not hungry until lunch at which point I’m not even that hungry. Has been a great tool to my weight loss and also keeps my body full of nutrients! Vegan or not, def worth having in your body and you won’t be disappointed. I drink mine with 10oz of vanilla almond milk, absolutely delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Dalton

customer_reviews.title: This is a meal supplement that does what it is advertised to do.
customer_reviews.text: Chocolatey flavor very likable. The all organic ingredients are excellent. By having one shake in the morning and one shake in the evening, I was able to consistently lose 2 lbs per week and I was not hungry after drinking the shake. I have not experienced any digestive issues after using this product for 3 months. I also like being able 2 eat what I want when I want to temporarily discontinue using what's it called gardenline of life. Do you know of any downsides to it. It is not the fastest way to lose weight, but my doctor says it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: 10x the amount of carbs they used to be!!??
customer_reviews.text: Am I missing something?? What happen to the carbs!? I always used these shakes because they were only one carb per scoop, now they’re 10 carbs per scoop!!?? Not only that but I ordered my usual 3 containers and got both versions, one with high carbs and two with the old low carb formula. No warning about the change. I was using it everyday thinking it’s low carb until I noticed it’s now 10x the carbs it used to be!! Extremely disappointed... I guess I’m saying goodbye to these after many years of repeat purchasing. With low carb and keto diets being so popular right now, that was a pretty stupid move...
customer_reviews.author: Jen Leffler

customer_reviews.title: "Lighly Sweet" and no horrible Stevia grossness!
customer_reviews.text: This review is specifically for the "Lightly Sweet" no Stevia version... I love this product, it's neutral in taste with just a touch of sweetness, the best part is NO yucky chemical Stevia flavor. I ABHOR Stevia, and good luck finding a meal replacement or protein powder without it. As for the graininess, just use a stick blender to mix it, that will give you a thick milk shake type texture. Still a little graininess, but it's not bad at all, 5 stars for taste and nutrition, I hope they don't mess with this formula. <3
customer_reviews.author: Elcy

customer_reviews.title: Best meal replacement shake
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best meal replacement shakes I’ve tried. It keeps me full for several hours and my sugar cravings have decreased. I drink it in the mornings since I don’t normally eat breakfast and it keeps me going until lunch. It’s not overly sweet but the chocolate flavor satisfies my sweet tooth. I used a blender bottle to shake it up with unsweetened coconut/almond milk. It blends together smoothly and not gritty. I personally like the flavor and it tastes healthy. If you’re looking for a shake that tastes like and actual chocolate milkshake with all its glory, you will be disappointed. But if you’re looking for a nutritious alternative, this has everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Helping me lose weight
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love.. Honestly though, by its self it doesn't keep me as full as everyone says.( I like to eat alot) But i add an extra 20g of a different protein and it keeps me full for at least 5 hours. I've been on a fitness/weightloss journey and I would def recommend. Worth the price, it lasts me about a month and I use it everyday for breakfast before I work out. Go to recipe: 1 scoop Raw Meal Replacement 20 G of any protien you like 1 medium size banana(100g) OR 70g of blueberries 1 cup almond/coconut milk sooo yummy
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa R.

customer_reviews.title: amount
customer_reviews.text: My concern is the amount in that big jar for a large... I understand the concept of settling with packaging, but half? It just seems unreasonable that the container would be twice as large as needed for the contents. It also begs the question as to whether or not a full 32 oz. is being delivered. Maybe I will take my little jug to the post office to weigh it.
customer_reviews.author: rc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Raw Meal Replacement shakes. I personally put 2 scoops with a bottle of water, (see instructions) and I had a pinch of flaxseed. I love Garden of Life products. I’ve loss 47 lbs. and my body at 60 years of age and now back to my size 2/4’s, I’m happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Ferrouillet Gusman

customer_reviews.title: Serving size not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking the raw meal meal replacement for well over a year and I love it. It tastes best with vanilla almond milk, I usually dilute it 4oz. of almond milk 4oz. of water. My only complaint is that the packaging clearly states 28 servings and that it's weighed for accuracy, although my last 5 orders have all come up short about 23 servings per canister. I have a subscription so I get these monthly, there is no option to get them every 3 weeks and I depend on this for the nutritional value. I shouldn't have to order extra to accommodate for the shortage. I genuinely like the product, please do better at accurately measuring the servings.
customer_reviews.author: Sable Selena

customer_reviews.title: Tastes AMAZING + Feel SUPERB!
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my blender bottle with almond milk (original sweetened) and tastes AMAZING. I definitely have felt more energy and has been great recovery for me after workouts (just started a month ago). Also, I’ve lost 14lb as well (using this in addition to 2-3x week exercise + watching calories). Biggest thing - regardless of weight loss - is the fact that I feel so much better and started drinking this before working out and eating healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Buying a Good Protein Powder - Not Easy
customer_reviews.text: I did my research - this product is overall rated as on of the top brands for Plant Based Protein Powders - key word Plant Based. I have only purchased Protein Powders with Whey. If your first time for a Plant Based Protein - you might want to know it has a green tint - I can't get past the green tint - it's not like drinking a green smoothie - this is just ugly. I wasted some monies - my fault - but if you know it's going to be an unappealing tinge green - rated high compared to other like products
customer_reviews.author: Spicy60s

customer_reviews.title: like Chia seeds and pumpkin
customer_reviews.text: Very powdery tasting, u know gritty ! It got a very low rating on the Protein Powder assessment done by the Clean Label Project they tested all of the protein powders and found lead and mercury and all kinds of toxins so I am not buying them anymore, when these are done I am done gonna use nuts, hemp hearts and seeds, like Chia seeds and pumpkin seeds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Very Chalky Texture
customer_reviews.text: The vanilla flavor is fantastic, but the texture is not. Like a ground up vanilla flavored tums. I've been drinking shakeology for awhile now, and this is extremely chalky compared to plant based shakeology. I purchased this because it was on sale, as shakeology is very expensive and there are times I want to drink more than one shake a day for the extra protein. I also wanted to feed it to my children to get some healthy nutrients into their body, but this will have to have a lot of extra orange juice, bananas and yogurt to make it palatable.
customer_reviews.author: Adria H.

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I love GoL products so this was a no brainer for me. I add this to my smoothies for a complete vegan liquid lunch. Spinach, banana, strawberry, papaya, mango, protein powder, hemp seeds, unsweetened almond milk. Some fruit is frozen and some is not. I switch certain fruits when I lack others. Otherwise this is an awesome meal replacement. The added protein from such a clean brand like Garden of Life is a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Olga B.

customer_reviews.title: Is your diet Pizza and Fast-Food? Get this.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to assist with my morning acidic stomach from my poor diet. I'm not trying to lose weight, I'm trying to feel better and im looking to add the missing nutrients to my body that pizza and fast food do not provide. This has helped me in every way. I feel more energy in the morning when I drink this vs just Energy Drink and Multi-Vitamin My daily bowel movements are healthier looking I no longer feel ill in the mornings even if i ate poorly or even ate until moments before bed I did notice how badly i was dehydrated and required more water. Amazing Product for a person who has a crummy diet.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My husband, oldest son, and I drink these shakes on a regular basis. We have all notice a positive difference in our health and body since we have been drinking these shakes the last few months. I personally have noticed it helps my digestive and sinus issues. We usually get the chocolate flavor. I have told my mom about it who has noticed positive benefits and have told others as well. You have to make sure you follow the directions if you don't want it chalky.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fills me up and helps my health
customer_reviews.text: I use this each morning with other herbs and fruit and veggies to battle my cancer. Been using it as a smoothie additive for a year now. My oncologist said "what ever your doing keep doing it because I'm staying stable" I like it and it does fill me up. I mix it with gatoraid , blueberries, cucumber , turmeric, devils claw, richi mushroom, honey, apple cider vinegar, cod liver oil, extra virgin olive oil, black seed, walnyts, almonds ,banana and apple. It sounds nasty but tastes ok
customer_reviews.author: school of art

customer_reviews.title: Protient and Fiber Oranic Drink
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product. I love it and for the price, it is a great product for the pocket book. The taste is great. I add fruit and or coconut milk to this to make a great smoothie. Highly recommend as a meal replacement. I am trying to lose weight and cannot eat anything with yeast, milk or gluten. This product fills the bill. It is organic, sugar free - does have stevia, but does not taste sweet, so it has the right blend. This is both a fiber high and protein drink which I have looked for and now I have the perfect drink. Thanks for taking the time to really create a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: dbm23j

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Raw Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Been using this specific product for a few years now. For a reason. Ingredients. Composition. And, flavor. It also blends well. Contains a lot of good stuff. I take this daily but... as a bonus it allows me to mix things up if, by chance I feel like I haven't consumed enough vegetables and healthy fruits for the day. Also good stuff for the gut (enzymes). - I know there are some people who don't like yogurt yet also don't want to just get an enzyme supplement. I do use this in conjunction with a Raw Greens Powder to just fortify my daily regimen. Again, my go to Raw Protein Powder.
customer_reviews.author: Nov

customer_reviews.title: Happy Breakfast Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have problems digesting food in the morning and thus stopped eating early, which never does me any good so i have been looking for healthy alternatives. I tried the vanilla version of this and honestly, wasn't all too excited but the chocolate one is awesome. Now I will say that no matter how much i attempt to stir, there's always a slight powdery taste to it but the heck, compared to all the crazy products out there that don't compare to the nutritional quality of this one. I start it out with water and then add my milk alternative to it.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: WAY too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I may be in the minority, but I don't want a "meal" shake to taste sweet, and this product is WAY to sweet – stevia sweet at that. I don't like stevia or the aftertaste at all but didn't expect this to be so very sweet! I truly thought it would be more subtle to take the edge off of the overall combination of ingredients and could be hidden with add-ins. It's unfortunate because I think I'd really like it if it wasn't for the overwhelming aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Page C. Fagalde

customer_reviews.title: Best over all powder for the the price!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great- instantly cures my hunger- I use 12 oz of almond milk in chocolate flavor as my liquid to 1 scoop of powder. Makes it a chocolate lovers heaven and guilt free. This is my breakfast and lunch replacement. It allows me to get through my day with energy unlike how regular food bogs me down. I have digestive issues and this has been a definite game changer! P.s it will taste a little chalky if you only use 8oz of fluid. 12oz makes a big difference and you do need to shake well!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Chiarenza

customer_reviews.title: Helped My Ulcerative Colitis
customer_reviews.text: I've probably tried 100+ protein and meal replacement products, all with various reactions. With MS, colitis, and multiple food allergies, I often get reactions although the ingredients seem ok. Everything I ate for breakfast was a problem - organic, gluten, dairy, and soy free cereals, oatmeal, etc. This worked like a charm and delicious with the addition of cinnamon and cocoa or instant coffee for variety. I add colostrum and collagen and have had excellent results repairing a damaged colon.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mac

customer_reviews.title: NOT as previously purchased
customer_reviews.text: Totally changed since I bought IN store (which I will de next time, if I ever buy this product again... Probably will try new brand, was a loyal customer.) Appearance is now green & does not taste of vanilla. I made with vanilla almond milk like I have done for months before now. More liquid viscosity then when I bought in store... Previous to had purchased all flavors in store and loved it...so sad I wasted this much on a big size. Google search said they sold out to Nestle & changed formulas...
customer_reviews.author: Quincy Sobiech

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this (vanilla flavor) to help me lose weight but it tastes horrible. It smells like Play-Doh and tastes worse than that. I have to add so many other ingredients just to be able to stomach the stuff that it really ruins the point of a diet drink. The best combo I came up with was almond milk, bananas and peanut butter. But by then, the calories have sky-rocketed. I might as well eat a real meal. Other than the taste, the texture is strange too. It's very thick, you have to use a blender to mix it or you'll have clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: SUGAR SUGAR SUGAR **** READ THE LABEL ****
customer_reviews.text: As a busy person who has ordered Garden of Life meal replacement a good number of times, I ASSUMED that it was the stevia sweetened version (shame on me). The 13 grams of carbs with 6 grams (one teaspoon) of sugar, compared to the 8 grams of carbs with 1 gram of sugar in the stevia sweetened version, wrecked my blood glucose read. Then I read the label. Now it gets thrown out. What a waste of $44
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Yummy for my tummy !
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. its delish! however its all in how you make it. I don't like it with water...yuk! i mix mine with almond milk and some frozen peaches and a few dashes of cinnamon and it taste like a peach cobbler! I recommend this product to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: SexyLBCityChic562

customer_reviews.title: Macros don't match the nutrition facts on the product page
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the keto diet and I was exited to see that the nutrition facts on the product page indicated that this product had 1 net carb (8 carbs - 7 fiber). The product I received has 8 net carbs (10 carbs - 2 fiber). I won't be able to use this product as it's not worth the carb load. I see this practice as deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of this product. I received a kidney transplant in 2017. I have monthly labs to monitor my kidney status. I figured this would be a great way to see if this meal replacement would adversely affect my blood work. I was happy to see my blood work remained the same and in some areas improved. Of course, this doesn't prove anything. I just know I feel great when taking this product and my blood work seems to enjoy it as well.
customer_reviews.author: ronald Kenyatta

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. It was 75% full but I know the size is based on weight not volume. The powder itself smells yummy but the taste was not what I expected. First time using a more natural ingredient powder. Made one for breakfast and another for lunch. The second one I added a tablespoon of vanilla creamer and it definitely helped. Next time going to try almond milk. I do like and it is filling so just need to play around with adding other things for taste. So far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Too SWEET!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the greens one, and thought this one didn't have any sweeteners either, but I missed it, my fault. I really hate stevia, since I don't like too sweet anything, and stevia tastes like sugar made out of metal shavings, it's really sickening to me, though I know some people love it, cook with it, etc. I just tried everything to mask it and couldn't. Just my opinion, but I hated wasting it. The other one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Christine ParisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I was an avid Shakeology drinker but no matter what I added or how I mixed it, it always had an aftertaste and upset my stomach. I thought I’d give this a try and I’m SO glad I did. Yes, it’s slightly chalky, but the flavor is terrific, it mixes well in my ninja (I use unsweetened almond milk and frozen berries), and keeps me full for 3-4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: thezopfs

customer_reviews.title: Okay tasting but has Stevia
customer_reviews.text: This product blends well, is okay tasting BUT I didn't realize it had stevia when I purchased it, for me stevia has a terrible sweet after taste that seems to last for a very long time. Too bad they don't use date sugar or coconut sugar as the sweetener, they're both low glycemic and don't ruin one's taste buds for hours afterwards. I'll be giving this product away and hope to find an alternative that does not have stevia - ughhhh!!!
customer_reviews.author: Friscochase

customer_reviews.title: Not a good taste at all
customer_reviews.text: Upon doing research on Low/No Carb Meal replacements I ran across this and saw that it had decent reviews, and what seemed to be a good balance of nutrition/vitamins vs low/no Carbs. I was looking forward to using this after receiving it. I have tried several different ways of mixing this, w/water, w/milk, in a blender, in blender bottles, w/ice w/o ice... I just cannot seem to get it to mix to the point where it doesn't taste like I'm drinking raw powder with the aftertaste of paste. Total waste of money IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Issues with insoluable fiber
customer_reviews.text: I noticed issues with constipation the next day after drinking this and kept thinking it must be other factors but time and time again, I noticed the only times I would be constipated is the day after drinking this. It has 6grams of insoluable fiber, which maybe for someone 120lbs is too much, not sure. I mix one scoop with coconut milk and even tried diluting it by making it with double liquids and drinking lots of water through the day and I still get hard pebble-like bowel movements. Too bad because I really like the ingredients this contains.
customer_reviews.author: Target Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Believe the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: This was so disgusting that I couldn’t drink it all. I threw the container out because I was gagging while trying to drink this. I had been using Isagenix shakes and was looking for something healthier but I can’t get past the taste. Believe the other reviews I read some on how bad it tasted but didn’t listen and wastes my money!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: It's not chocolate milk, but it does taste better with milk vrs water. The taste is not terrible, but it isnt great. I'm giving 5 stars because it works and isn't bad if you use milk. After I drink one I feel full and have energy to finish my work day. I'm 6' and have a physical outdoor job. I'm going to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Random 22.5% price hikes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this meal replacement on Subscribe & Save for more than a year. It’s a decent substitute for my prefered meal replacement and the taste is manageable. The entire reason I started with this product, even with the quality being less than what I was using is the price. But they recently hiked the price up to almost $8 more. A 22.5% increase! If they’re going to make those kinds of pice hikes, this product no longer becomes the better alternative.
customer_reviews.author: NRValeck

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after using shakeology for a while. This is easier on the tummy and has great ingredients. The taste is not an issue for me. When I mix it with water it has a hint of chocolate. Way better than other shakes with the same ingredients. It is a little gritty, but I'm okay with it. Not sure anyone should not expect that as it is packed full of super foods. :)
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Looking for Plant Based Without Stevia
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the hunt for a plant based powder sweetened with cane sugar and not stevia. After sampling Aloha and Sun Warrior , Garden of Life tastes 100x better. It only has 130 calories per scoop and is filling. I have this for 2 meals a day and I feel so much lighter and overall better. I use a shaker bottle and use 30 calorie vanilla almond milk. It is not sweet like Nesquick but it doesn’t taste like dirt either. Highly recommend for supplement or meal replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Very grainy texture though.
customer_reviews.text: This meal replacement powder is great! It has a great flavor and tons of great ingredients! Only downside is that it is VERY grainy in shakes. If you're a person who has an aversion to certain textures then the graininess of this product may not be for you. Ive blended it with many different things from yogurt and fruits to plain milk and water. Unfortunately no matter what you add or how simple you keep it you will still get that weird texture.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have lost count of how many tubs of this meal replacement I have ordered up to this point. This is absolutely my favorite meal replacement powder to date. The ingredients are so healthy and natural, and it really does keep me for for an extended amount of time. I can have a shake with non sweetened almond milk and maybe half a banana and stay full for hours at a time. It helps me feel energized and tastes great. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Theresa McClinton

customer_reviews.title: My fave quick breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I oddly love this stuff for how it makes me feel. Totally hate skipping a day of it. I have vitamin/mineral deficiencies and other autoimmune related issues and this meal shake makes me feel good. Better than I have in awhile. I have it for breakfast and I am not as tired and moody at the end of the work day. The texture stays sandy but I got past it and the flavor is fine for my 40 something palate. I mix with the Silk Almond & Coconut Milk Unsweetened. And will do this for as long as it keeps working.
customer_reviews.author: Violet Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Thickk Queen
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months as a meal/snack replacement, It's thick and filling. The powder can clean you out ( if you know what I mean 😂) if you aren't use to the fiber content. I highly recommend adding some cold coffee, milk (any kind) , and ice to make it extra tasty! I use about half the recommended amount to make a "snack shake". I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Drink
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for quite a while for something that would not only taste good, but did NOT contain inulin, guar gum, or xantham gum (none of those agree with my tummy). This one is a WINNER, and even though I did use a small blender with almond milk it did blend "pretty good". It is quite tasty, but of course, that is a matter of preference. I am drinking the chocolate flavor so not much to complain about there! It is not gritty or leaves an aftertaste as many of the others. I recommend trying this, and I will probably order other flavors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ischmah2

customer_reviews.title: Chalky, weird sweetness
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I add to it, no matter how little or long I have it in the blender, CHALKY and weird texture. I wanted to love it, I really did, has some good ingredients but I just don’t like it. Strange because I’ve tried literally dozens over the years and some were not so good but I can’t can’t get over the chalkiness. Has a weird sweetness to it as well
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: 28 serving..
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I saw any benefits in such a short time, but the product seemed to make me feel better and I was less hungry. The only issue I had/have is.. for me I had to make a 16 ounce blender in order to me feel right, 8 ounces simply did nothing for hunger, so the supply lasted me 14 days, making it kind of expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great powder at a great cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace Shakeology powder. While it isn't exactly the same, it's a very good replacement. There are a lot of very healthy ingredients. I mix mine with sweetened vanilla almond milk most of the time and I think it tastes great like that.
customer_reviews.author: Genna Howard

customer_reviews.title: I can't stand the taste
customer_reviews.text: I will say that I've had various meal replacement shakes and protein shakes over the years (Lean shakes, whey powders, meal replacement shakes, etc), and I have never really had a problem with the flavor of any of them. I've got a very low bar on what a protein shake needs to taste like to be drinkable, and I cannot stomach this one. I've tried to give it a chance. I've had it normally, I've had it with milk, I've blended it with milk, honey, bananas, etc, but I just flat out cannot stand the taste of this. This is probably the first protein powder I'm throwing away mostly full.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bader

customer_reviews.title: Overly sweetened for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used Garden of Life products for years to supplement my nutrition with great success and pleasure. My only complaint is that the vanilla is VERY sweet. I usually order the “slightly sweet” meal supplement, thought I would try vanilla and found it to be so sweet I will have to combine it with the unflavored protein mix just to finish the container.
customer_reviews.author: JimboO

customer_reviews.title: Nasty
customer_reviews.text: I thought everyone was over exaggerating saying this was nasty. They weren't, it's disgusting but I chug it down as quickly as I can and have nasty burps that taste like it for half an hour. It doesn't blend well in a shaker cup so I had to blend it in my Ninja blender. Just drink it fast. It does make me full to the point where I don't even feel like drinking anything either. I take it at the end of the day once I've had all my water and food for the day and start to feel hungry before bed. This kicks the hunger instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Genny

customer_reviews.title: Became VERY SICK!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely disgusting. Became horribly sick after drinking this for a few months. Didn't know why I kept randomly getting sick...thought I had covid, test results came back negative. So I started thinking what has changed in my diet recently, and the only thing was this powder. I had horrible diarrhea and vomiting for about a week or so and just felt so weak and tired! So I did my research and discovered horrible things about this product and will NEVER, EVER buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 30 mins my stomach started to hurt real bad and I was throwing up after
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write a review/comments about the product that I buy here on amazon. I received this meal replacement last week Wednesday and I was so excited to try it out. So the next day I didn't have time to make breakfast so I decided to take the meal replacement. After 30 mins my stomach started to hurt real bad and I was throwing up after. I was thinking maybe it was the powder that irritates my stomach. So today April 17 I tried to take it again and it happens again. I'm wondering if I can return this product since I have no use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Asianchick0910

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I can't confirm that all the vitamins and minerals in this are actually absorbed by the body but I can confirm that I feel good after taking it. I use this as a post workout powder and noticed that I was making more gains than before so the protein is definitely effective. I also don't eat breakfast and feel fine for at least 3 hours after taking this. The flavors are fine, I don't care for the chocolate but like the vanilla and vanilla chai.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Does just what it claims, with a little tweaking!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find that the vanilla flavor was actually good. Added a little sugar-free Torani french vanilla syrup with 9oz. water at 7am and had satiety until around 10am. A small handful of almonds or a few tiny sausage links in between consuming the shakes for breakfast and lunch proved very satisfying snacks that kept my energy up and my hunger down. I just hope I can afford to continue to keep up this great lifestyle change in diet and loose some weight in the process!
customer_reviews.author: SpeedmomSC

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste!
customer_reviews.text: I normally order Organic Vanilla Bean, plant based protein powder. I read the reviews on this brand and decided to give it a try. I tried it with water then I tried it with almond milk....I threw it out. I now have thrown the entire supply in the trash. I would not recommend this to ANYONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nasty! Disgusting!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful taste! It gagged me! The reference to Chai flavor is an assault on chai products everywhere. I’ve been using protein products forever and I’m no youngster. This is one of the nastiest tastes ever to be sold.
customer_reviews.author: sam termine

customer_reviews.title: Heart palpitations within one hour of using. Ingredients has naturally occurring caffeine.
customer_reviews.text: Use this product with caution I developed heart palpitations within an hour of having one scoop not realizing it has naturally occurring caffeine in it. I am used to drinking coffee and coffee does not even do this to me. I am returning the product immediately. I do not think it is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Foss

customer_reviews.title: This tastes like peas and dirt
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the worst protein powder I've ever had (Vegan wise) it tastes like peas and dirt. It does blend well, however when it tastes that bad it doesn't matter how well it blends. I couldn't even finish my first serving, and I eat a lot of plain healthy foods that I can tolerate a lot of bad tasting foods. This stuff made me gag. Wouldn't buy again but it was a great price for dirt flavored pea protein.
customer_reviews.author: AWiggle

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Pea Protein!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product many times now and I was very happy with it. It tasted great, kept me full and despite usually getting spacey and tired after having just about any sort of breakfast, this didn't do that. However, I am giving a one star because this last batch was disgusting. This same exact scenario played out with the last pea protein-based meal replacement powder I used to buy. Watch out for pea protein.
customer_reviews.author: Marlia

customer_reviews.title: The nutrition in this stuff is incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Just read the back label and you have to be impressed. Getting this much nutrition in a good tasting powder that absorbs OK is all I can ask for. Does 100% of it absorb, no. It's good enough though. I like to add a little almond milk and it's easy to drink. Loads of different protein, vitamins, minerals, fiber etc and I get in into my body in two minutes. Love this stuff. Since using this I've also noticed better energy. My nails are stronger, skin has improved and regularity has to.
customer_reviews.author: J's Genius

customer_reviews.title: Love garden of life products
customer_reviews.text: It tastes like chocolate milk and is just slightly gritty. I drink a serving at 9am and I don’t get hungry until 1:30 pm so it has been a great daily breakfast on the go. I can definitely tell a difference when I skip it so it is helping! It’s very similar to Kachava which I have also tried and I’d say garden of life has more product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: for me I was looking for something super easy to digest (I have a very sensitive stomach ...
customer_reviews.text: Have done a TON of research comparing and contrasting ingredients...for me I was looking for something super easy to digest (I have a very sensitive stomach and cannot stomach Vega, for example), a good vitamin profile, Amino Acids and Greens added! This fit the bill overall as the best. And I always add some kind of fruit so it tastes good to me. People complain about the chalkiness and if flavor is your no. 1 concern maybe you go with a different product, but for me flavor is only one factor I look for. Vanilla goes with everything and the chocolate is decent (if I had to choose just one I would say Vanilla).
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredient, did not give me gas
customer_reviews.text: This is literary one of the few proteins that does not give me gas. I love that it is plant-based and the quality of the ingredients. The taste is good ( not delicious but not bad either) and have not gotten tired of it. I have been drinking it almost every day of the week for the last year and a half. My mom has a very delicate stomach and she felt good with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder I have tried
customer_reviews.text: By far the best protein powder I have tried, and I have tried many brands. This dissolves easily with a spoon and is not chalky or super sweet. Also easy to digest. I would not call this delicious in any way, but more pallatable than Vega, Orgain, syntha six six star, dymatize, etc. My go to protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: 4freys

customer_reviews.title: Filling, tastes good, and animal free if that’s your thing.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, especially with yogurt and coconut milk. Has a bit of chalky/gritty taste, but I’ve yet to try a meal powder that doesn’t. This is better dissolving and tasting than most. Not hungry after, so it works.
customer_reviews.author: Bob F

customer_reviews.title: taste not so great !! But keeps me full !!
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is nasty drinking it without adding anything to it, for this product to be enjoyable you need to add some type of fruit, almond milk, ice, and vanilla flavor and blend it into a smoothie then it taste great, if you don’t mix it with anything the taste is horrible, if you don’t use a blender or some type of mixer it’s really grainy, but I give the product a 4 because it does keep me full throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive no different than whey protein
customer_reviews.text: Plant base and whey protein are the same to me. I don’t feel nor see the difference. Not bad protein for $21 the first time I purchased. Second time I tried to reorder the same protein but this time they jacked the price up to $41 per container. Not worth for $28 servings. I’m going back to whey protein
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: So So at Best
customer_reviews.text: I have a meal replacement shake every day. My usual brand was out of stock on Amazon so I tried Garden of Life. I found the product to be very unsatisfying in terms of taste. Not a good chocolate flavor by comparison. The product was also much more gritty than other brands. I found it really did not have very good solubility. No clumping but a granular noticeable particle presence. I used a BlendTec on the "Smoothie" setting which always does the trick. I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: BEST MEAL REPLACEMENT POWDER THERE IS
customer_reviews.text: After trying MANY meal replacements, this is by far my favorite. It’s delicious in my smoothies without adding that yucky vitamin taste like many other products. I think it tastes a bit like delicious cake batter Packed with protein, vitamins, etc & it makes me feel truly AMAZING & ready to slay the day. Can’t drink my smoothies without it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Filla

customer_reviews.title: Love this now California heavy metal compliant shake.
customer_reviews.text: First off this brand has passed the State of California law on heavy metals. If it or any brand didn't has to have a stamp stating a warning in the state of California this product doesn't meet its safety standards for heavy metals. Cali has highest standards for consumer products in the country. The shake is good just make sure you have a healthy snack like fruit and or nuts to round out the nutritional profile of a meal. I use this shake to increase my plant based foods consumption.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Cake batter flavor with sand for texture
customer_reviews.text: I got the lightly sweet flavor because I cannot stand sweeteners in anything, and while the flavor was improved when I added cocoa powder and honey, it is SO GRAINY the texture is a little nauseating which in turn ruins the flavor altogether. It does taste mildly like vanilla cake batter (with fine playground sand mixed in for texture) finishing with a hint of wheatgrass. I can’t recommend this, sorry. When the product that’s supposed to replace the meal threatens to make an encore appearance every time, it makes it extra hard to avoid ordering a replacement for the replacement via DoorDash... 🤦‍♀️🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: AmyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Best Vegan No-Stevia protein!
customer_reviews.text: I can't do fake sugars and I cannot seem to warm up to the taste of stevia. It ruins anything that I try. I was looking for a low-sugar, Vegan protein and I have tried a lot of powders. This one is the ticket!! You'll want it in this non-flavor (those have added stuff). You can add in a banana or sweetened almond milk for a touch of flavor. I also put in some plain cacao. It's pretty darned tasty and really helps after an intense workout.
customer_reviews.author: TBehr

customer_reviews.title: The best on the market for body, mind, wallet.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Great as a post workout protein drink, and or meal replacement! I have a two scoop drink every morning with almond milk. It gives me the energy I need to get the morning started without coffee, and keeps me content for about 4 hours. The energy is from all the nutrients in this product. No caffeine! All organic, and complete! It's a must have in my household and the flavor is great as well! I love chocolate, so that's the flavor I get. Vanilla Chai tastes like a good vanella! The vanilla flavor isn't as vanilla as the chai. FYI.. Just look at the ingredients. I challenge you to find one bad ingredient.... Case closed. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Wolverine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for anemia & fatigue!
customer_reviews.text: If you have anemia like me, and struggle with fatigue, I promise this protein shake with make you feel healthier than ever before! Drinking these has become a part of my morning routine and I’ve never felt better. It’s vegan, has practically zero sugar, no artificial flavors, and is totally natural and packed with nutrition! And it tastes AMAZING. Just like a chocolate shake. It doesn’t have any weird chalky texture and blends so smoothly. Adding chia seeds is a good tip too! This protein shake is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Alice

customer_reviews.title: Old rancid ingredients?
customer_reviews.text: This is just simply the worst tasting product. I finished off the vanilla chai container I ordered before this one, even though it tasted bitter, old, and had a terrible after flavor. I figured the chocolate flavor would be better, but it's worse. It tastes older, like expired nuts, and I'm not allergic to anything in it, but I am allergic to rancid oils, and this made my face swell and made me lethargic after eating it. Sad, because I really like the premise and the listed nutritional values.
customer_reviews.author: Jeshua Amos Serdynski

customer_reviews.title: It really does not taste good, at all!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I had read the prior comments regarding the taste and honestly I wasn’t expecting it to be fabulous ( I mean it’s a meal supplement), but when I say this was not good I mean not palpable at all. I tried it with almond milk, I tried adding a banana, I even added sugar substitute but nothing made it taste better. I was so hopeful because this has literally everything in it that I need but alas I will be sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: The taste is pleasant and you can pretty much live off of it indefinitely.
customer_reviews.text: Not much more to say. The taste isn't good enough that I find myself looking forward to it, but it's pleasant enough and I have no complaints. On camping trips, I tend toward absolute minimalism in terms of food logistics, and this stuff is great for that. After ten days or so, I get tired of it and start wishing for some variety. When I'm at home, I usually just have it for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't change a thing.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. No time for breakfast 2 or 3 days a week. I just mix it with cold water, drink it down in a couple of big gulps and go (it settles quickly so you can't really sip it). Holds me for a couple hours till I'm done with the commute and have gotten through a bit of the busy morning. Perfect. Wouldn't change a thing. Digests easily, no bloating.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Tannenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Best shake I've had.
customer_reviews.text: I have had other meal replacement shakes and they were terrible. I was reluctant to try another but I needed a dairy free and low sugar shake. I actually like this one. I usually have it for lunch and throw a banana in it in my nutribullet. It fills me up and I know I'm getting everything my body needs. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: M. LaBella-Lajos

customer_reviews.title: No Chocolate taste rather chalk taste
customer_reviews.text: Terrible taste experience. Chalk blah taste no chocolate flavor. I couldn’t drink it. I threw it out. I don’t like to waste things but no way no how could I finish it. I mixed it as I normally would make my protein shake (unsweetened coconut milk, coffee, banana, spinach) it didn’t taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Davidh82

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR TO ALL PROTEIN DRINKS IN MY OPINION
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's a meal replacement with the amount of calories as a diet protein drink. I love that there is no milk protein. It is vegan. I love that I can drink it and not cringe. The flavor is pleasant. It IS a little grainy and I have tried making it in an electric blender as well as a tumble-blend type of cup. But it's very little and I don't mind it. The ingredients are so far superior to any protein shakes I have found.
customer_reviews.author: GRANDMUFFIN

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well with water
customer_reviews.text: This formula is a bit chalky, but once you get used to the taste it is a great way to supplement or lessen caloric intake. You stay full and it has a great list of quality ingredients. I feel as though the price is a bit high and the portion is large compared to some other products. It has a great protein count. I have to supplement with additional supplements to get recommended daily allowances for certain vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Elf

customer_reviews.title: Super food
customer_reviews.text: the flavor definitely take some getting used to but the nutrient content is fantastic I suffer from fibromyalgia and have a lot of trouble with fatigue and processing certain carbohydrates and this really helps me a lot it's power-packed and I feel great I really love this product. it blends well and I find that I can even use a Shaker and don't have to use my blender if I want to add it to juice or almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Lynn James

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: nothing taste great to me but it dose the job I need it to do, give me all the stuff I wont or cant get at the store and I believe every one could use this to improve there health and now days that cant be bad.
customer_reviews.author: Blaster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protein Shake
customer_reviews.text: Can't and don't want to drink whey protein powder and this presented the best option. My wife (nutritionist) reviewed everything that's in it and told me it was one of the best things I could ever put in my body. That was enough for me! I use it every morning with hemp milk and some peanut butter powder to make a great chocolate PB shake. Can't miss on this one and much better for you.
customer_reviews.author: ELMarkey

customer_reviews.title: Kinda gross
customer_reviews.text: Does not mix well in shaker. It separates out. Even when run in blender it separates. Taste is not great so maybe I need to think "if it's good for you it tastes bad" mentality. Will not purchase this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Lars1y

customer_reviews.title: no after taste like some reviewers say
customer_reviews.text: I switched from meal replacement and saw the reviews on Garden of Life and gave it a try. it is delicious, no after taste like some reviewers say. I tried the chocolate flavor with one scoop of PB2 and it tastes super good. The consistency is smoothie like. Just add 5 ice cubes and you are good to go! I used to be an Herbalife fan for two years but decided to switch because Herbalife products contain milk and soy, and some other ingredients that I can’t pronounce.
customer_reviews.author: Johana

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and nutritious
customer_reviews.text: A little grainy when I mix with almond milk, but this is and has always been my favorite flavor of organic meal GOL has come out with. I’ve been drinking this since 2016 after workouts and whenever I’m on the go and can’t find a microwave to reheat a hot meal (I’m a home health therapist). Glad to know that even after a few years, the flavor is still as delicious as it was back then.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Kept me full for 5 hours!!😁
customer_reviews.text: I needed a meal replacement drink for the time's I either was in a hurry or just didn't want to cook, this meal replacement powder is my new best friend!! I personally like the flavor I got chocolate, I also was so happy that I didn't notice that I was hungry for 5 hours after I drink it. For my lifestyle that was amazing!! I am very happy with this meal replacement powder and want to say thank you because it is exactly what I needed and it is encouraging to have something that works for me at my age (45) to aid in my weight loss!!
customer_reviews.author: gena

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product was the healthiest choice based on the Nutrition facts, but dont buy it. It tasted so bad! It's a waste of money because you will not want to drink it. I read a review that said, "you will get use to the taste of dirt". That review is not true. You also cannot chug it bc of the consistancy. The powder does not mix well so there are tiny pieces of powder in them also.
customer_reviews.author: Lantwan

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how to feel about this
customer_reviews.text: The formula looks good on paper, but I can’t really attest to the actual health benefits. I didn’t really feel better or worse, physically, drinking it. The drinking it is the hard part. The chalkiness makes the texture of anything you add irrelevant, and the taste.... oh god, so disappointed. It’s literally like trying to choke down a ground up vanilla scented stick of chalk, and I mixed mine with 1/2 cup of frozen berries, 1/2 cup of frozen sweet cherries, 1 cup of unsweetened vanilla coconut milk, and 1 tbsp of honey. All run through a blender. And STILL couldn’t escape the extreme yuck of this mix.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AWFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had really FOUND something since this product doesn't contain lactose or gluten, two of my allergy triggers. But it just tastes AWFUL and doesn't mix well at all. It stays grainy and icky, and I'm using an immersion blender to mix it with!!! I definitely WILL NOT be trying any other flavors of this slop!! I will go with the regular diet products, and use a handful of Lactaid!! Save your money, DO NOT BUY THIS AWFUL STUFF!!!
customer_reviews.author: JMac

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Raw Organic Meal Replacement Powder - Vanilla, 28 Servings, 20g Plant Based Protein Powder, Superfoods, Greens, Vitamins Minerals Probiotics & Enzymes All-in-One Meal Replacement Shake
product_meta.description: Flavor:Vanilla20 g Protein Less than 1 g of Sugar Loaded With 44 Superfoods USDA Organic Non GMO Project Verified Informed Choice - Trusted by Sport Certified NSF Gluten Free Real Raw Vanilla A Healthy Meal-On-The-Go Easy to Digest Live Probiotics No Added Sugars Raw - Vegan - Gluten Free - Dairy Free - Soy Free Certified Organic by QCS Certified B Corporation Boost Energy - Build Lean Muscle - Stay FullA delicious, organic Meal-On-The-Go, packed with incredible nutrition to help you satisfy hunger, manage weight and feel great! 20 g Clean Organic Plant Protein Loaded with 44 Superfoods Less than 1 g of Sugar 1.5 Live Probiotics, Plus Enzymes 21 Whole Food Vitamins & Minerals 7 g Organic FiberCertified VeganPlant Based 14 organic grains, seeds & legumes. Third party certified by Vegan ActionClean Tested and trusted for sportUSDA OrganicOrganic Matter Farmed without the use of toxic pesticides or fertilizersNon-GMO Verified Independent third party verificationRawRaw Whole Food Heat and processing can denature proteinsNo Junk Gluten, Soy & Dairy Free. No added sugars, artificial flavors or sweeteners Certified NSF Gluten Free Soy Free Dairy Free
feature_bullets: ON THE GO NUTRITION: 20 grams of clean, organic plant protein with 44 superfoods including organic grass juices, fruits and veggies and 6 grams of fiber to keep you satisfied
POST WORKOUT RECOVERY: Help build lean muscle and boost energy with this power packed meal replacement
VITAMINS AND MINERALS: This delicious vanilla protein powder is packed with 21 vitamins and minerals
MEAL REPLACEMENT SHAKE WITH PROBIOTICS: Tasty, smooth protein shake with 1.5 billion CFU probiotics and enzymes for easy digestion
VEGAN PROTEIN POWDER: Organic, gluten free, Star K kosher, vegan, dairy free, soy free, Informed Choice Certified (Trusted by Sport), non GMO whole food protein

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
